item.title: Installing Debian 9 Stretch Linux OS on a Dell Inspiron Laptop and Configuring the Wifi Network
item.description: Yesterday, I converted an 11-year old Dell Inspiron E1505 from Windows XP to Debian 9 Stretch. I may have overwrote my Windows XP OS. I do not care if I lost it since it's a vulnerable and outdated OS, which is no longer supported by Microsoft. I encountered difficulty with â€¦
item.dc:creator: pythonmarketer
